Census

Use demographic tools to enrich MTM insights.
Census

Ultra Localized Demographic Data

Canadian census data offers precise insights for business decisions, but its complexity can be a hurdle. The MTM Census Tool is a user-friendly, interactive dashboard that simplifies census data analysis, providing geography-based demographic information sourced directly from Statistics Canada.

Watch a Demo

Highlights

01

Geographic Filters

Analyze audiences across 70,000+ Geographic Areas, by region, city, or postal area to pinpoint where media and tech trends emerge.

02

Demographic Filters

Segment by 2,000+ Demographic Variables like age, gender, income, or language to reveal who’s driving adoption and change.
